alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Okaloosa and southeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1242 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Wright. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wright, Niceville, Eglin AFB and Valparaiso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
